summary: A look at what goes on backstage during the last broadcast of America's most celebrated radio show, where singing cowboys Dusty and Lefty, a country music siren, and a host of others hold court.
cast: Marylouise Burke|Woody Harrelson|L.Q. Jones|Tommy Lee Jones|Garrison Keillor|Kevin Kline|Lindsay Lohan|Virginia Madsen|John C. Reilly|Maya Rudolph|Tim Russell|Sue Scott|Meryl Streep|Lily Tomlin|Tom Keith|Jearlyn Steele|Robin Williams|Linda Williams|Prudence Johnson|Richard A. Grap|Debbie DeLisi|Bob Douglas|Adam Granger|Bill Hinkley|John Koerner|Judy Larson|Dan Newton|Jon Pankake|Dick Rees|Becky Schlegel|Pop Wagner|Kati Batchelder|Donna Marie Beard|Ray Beasley|Rita Cannon|Michael Cook|Alex Galick|Rachel Grubb|Freddy Hall|Leon Hiland|Amanda Hofman-Frethem|Geoffrey Hofman-Frethem|Punnavith Koy|Kayla Laursen|John Murray|Connie Newville|David O'Neill|Lisa Pechmiller|Joseph Andrew Schneider|Joel Thingvall|Jim Westcott
title: El último show
